attributes.action: give familys of british troops legal aid for inquests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The families of British troops killed in Iraq are being treated with "disregard and contempt" because the Government is failing to provide legal aid for inquests.

Many face crippling legal bills following inquests, despite the Prime Minister's recent pledge to provide them with the necessary legal funding.
